column13: next occurence published as Skeletonema subantractica. Both stem and next occurence should likely be transfered to Praecorethron, an extinct sister lineage to modern Corethron
this is the only occurence of Praeparalia in the Cretaceous
Witkowski et al., 2011 doesnt give the pic, but Kuba is a good taxonomist so we can give him a benefit
this is sister lineage to extant Biddulphia and now the genus is called Bidulphiella
Cretaceous Hemiaulus is an extinct sister lineage to modern Hemiaulus
Cretaceous Eunotogramma is a definitive sister lineage to modern Euonotogramma; very little shared features
Teo: Set the range of the first occurrence to the range of Campanian: 83.6-72. Was: 75
Teo: Set the range of the first occurrence to the range of Messinian: 7.2-5.3. Was 6.15
Teo: Set the range of the first occurrence to the range of the Late Miocene: 11.6 - 5.7. Was 5
Teo: Set the range of the first occurrence to the range of the Late Miocene: 11.6 - 5.7. Was 7
Teo: Set the range of the first occurrence to the range of the Middle Miocene: 16 - 11.6. Was 10
